extendedInfo.description: This is the FREE version of Simple Match, a very simplistic matching color game.If you like the game, "like" us on Facebook to read about all our updates!http://www.facebook.com/pages/Simple-Match/293645004009172-= Features =-* 3 different play modes: challenge, flash, classic* Jewels, bubbles, rounded blocks* Smooth animation* SD card friendly* Ad supported, all features of full version* No sound* Suitable for all ages* Playable with vertical or horizontal orientation, phones and tablets* Great for those meetings or classes when you're "paying attention"-= About the app =-In Simple Match, the goal is to match colored cards. Solve the puzzles as fast as possible and try to beat your best time. Be careful though - matching errors added seconds onto  your time.The 3 modes:ChallengeTest your memory and speed in 5 progressively harder levels.FlashThe app will ask you to find a colored card and it is up to you to remember where that color can be found. ClassicThis version is a single level that has the player try to solve the match puzzle with as few mistakes and as fast as possible. When the puzzle is complete, you can challenge it again, or go back to the main menu.

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Works fine on samsung galaxy s2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This is one of the hidden gems in the market. I don\'t see why there aren\'t more downloads! I feel sorry for the people who don\'t have this app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sd card friendly?
reviews.comment: I like, but where is the move to sd card? It says it can but it\'s not implemented?! Am i missing something?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Incrediblely simplistic and addictive!
reviews.comment: Got a few seconds to spare? That\'s all it\'ll take to play a couple of levels of Simple Match.  The simplistic genius of this game allows you to have an addictive puzzle game without the huge investment. If you dig it like I did, do yourself and the developer a favor: drop $1 for the paid version.  You won\'t be sorry!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Chele
reviews.comment: I enjoy this game. Find it relaxing.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: So its fun too play lol
